job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role providing basic IT support to HCL employees. Handle password resets,  software installation.
job_details.required qualification: B.Sc (IT) or BCA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: IT Helpdesk Trainee (Internal). 12-month role supporting internal employees. Learn to troubleshoot hardware/software issues,  set up new user accounts,  and manage IT assets.
job_details.required qualification: Diploma in Computer Science/IT or B.Sc (IT). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Warehouse Operations Trainee. 12-month role at a distribution center. Learn inventory management (SAP),  order processing,  and logistics coordination.
job_details.required qualification: B.Com (Logistics) or BBA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Warehouse Operations Trainee. 12-month role at a regional distribution center. Learn inventory management (SAP),  order processing,  and logistics coordination.
job_details.required qualification: B.Com or BBA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.

job_details.job description: Supply Chain Trainee (Logistics). 12-month office role at a plant. Coordinate with transporters,  manage dispatch documentation,  and track shipments.
job_details.required qualification: B.Com (Logistics) or BBA (non-premier institute). Must meet PMIS age (21-24) and income (<8L) criteria.
